item.title: New Year's Resolutions 2026
item.description:
Personal

  • Find a flat & move out
  • Spend less time on the computer & phone, use more analog tools

Fitness

  • Get back into my planned workout routine
  • 3x calisthenics / strength workout per week
  • 3x running per week
  • If my knee feels better, start running longer runs again
  • Half-marathon ðŸ‘€
  • More regular bouldering
  • More regular stretching

Hobbies & projects

  • Daily & consistent reading; read shorter books, various genres & authors
  • Work on core
  • Finish Obsidian vault revamp & set up matkv.dev automatic builds from the vault
  • Continue learning Rust & start with small projects
  • Watch more movies & go to cinema more often
This is what a log entry will look like.
